TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/ConnectionPointCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 將 ActiveX 控制項連接到處理控制項事件的用戶端。

span.span: Connects an ActiveX control to a client that handles the control’s events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX 控制項與透過其 COM 介面的用戶端通訊。ActiveX controls communicate with clients through their COM interface. 類別提供之間的連結類別和 ActiveX 控制項。The class provides the link between the class and the ActiveX control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 事件中 COM 和可連接物件 」 在 MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see "Events in COM and Connectable Objects" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public ConnectionPointCookie (object source, object sink, Type eventInterface);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object source, object sink, class System.Type eventInterface) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As Object, sink As Object, eventInterface As Type)
public: ConnectionPointCookie(System::Object ^ source, System::Object ^ sink, Type ^ eventInterface);

param.name: source
param.span: 包含連接點的可連接物件。

span.span: A connectable object that contains connection points.

param.name: sink
param.span: 從連接點接收輸出呼叫的用戶端接收 (sink)。

span.span: The client's sink which receives outgoing calls from the connection point.

param.name: eventInterface
param.span: 所要求的連接點物件的輸出介面。

span.span: The outgoing interface whose connection point object is being requested.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會建立 ActiveX 控制項與用戶端之間的連線。The constructor establishes a connection between the ActiveX control and the client.

exception.span: 連接點已達到連線限制，無法接受更多連線。

span.span: The connection point has already reached its limit of connections and cannot accept any more.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

summary.span: 將 ActiveX 控制項與用戶端中斷連接。

span.span: Disconnects the ActiveX control from the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放由 類別使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
